title: Fixing default values for LR and Epsilon in Adamax
body_html: It seems that the default values for LR and Epsilon (previously, 1E-2 and 1E-38 respectively) were different from the ones recommended by the authors (2E-3 and 1E-8, respectively). Other packages such as Keras (https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/optimizers.py#L474) and Lasagne (https://github.com/Lasagne/Lasagne/blob/master/lasagne/updates.py#L612) use the suggested values as well.

body: It seems that the default values for LR and Epsilon (previously, 1E-2 and 1E-38 respectively) were different from the ones recommended by the authors (2E-3 and 1E-8, respectively). Other packages such as Keras (https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/keras/optimizers.py#L474) and Lasagne (https://github.com/Lasagne/Lasagne/blob/master/lasagne/updates.py#L612) use the suggested values as well.
